Shoreline.Pipers Creek (Seattle):
Pipers Creek is a 1.4-mile (2.3 km) urban stream that is located in the Broadview and Blue Ridge neighborhoods of Seattle, Washington, in the United States of America.


== Course and features ==
The entire length of the creek is within the boundaries of Carkeek Park; and its mouth is at Puget Sound.
Its tributaries are Venema Creek and Mohlendorph Creek.
